content: Something must have happened to her, but... {A惊讶}every time she sees me, she <style=SizeBig>runs away!</style>

content: {A思考}<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, may I ask for your thoughts on something? Recently, the monitoring system at the Omni-Gallery has recorded several instances of mysterious entry and exit activity...

content: In experiments, repeated entry into the same space within a short time span often signals an anomaly, which can affect the surrounding environment...

content: {A思考}She should still be in the <style=Highlight>Aquarium</style>, if I'm not mistaken. You have my gratitude.
